name: I don't wanna be Woodstuck here
name_original: I don't wanna be Woodstuck here
description:
EARLY ACCESS

A local party game for 4 players.

Fill your van with Flower Fuel to get enough power to arrive at Woodstock first ! Run, jump, dash and steal eachother to collect maximum flowers for your van.

A game made for the ENJAM 2016, theme : flower power.

Play with Xbox360 Controller.

A : Jump

X : Cut flower

LB or RB + STICK : Dash

RT : Fill the van

CREDITS

Viviane Bicaba

Charlotte Couder

Fabien Fouetillou

Monetai

Loriane Savona

Timothée Sonnier
